summary: The meaning of art itself comes into question in this documentary about Shelby Lee Adams' controversial photos of families in Appalachia.
cast: Shelby Lee Adams|Chad Baker|Donnie Benton|Burley Childers|Homer Childers|James Childers|Joseph Childers|Rosalie Desrochers|Roy Childers|Debbie Childers|Selina Childers|Hort Collins|Brandon Cooper|Johnny Cooper|William Gorman|Samantha Guy|John Hall|Louise Hall|Emogene Jerry|Ralph Jacobs|Worley Jacobs|Shauna Joseph|Stephanie Lynn Joseph|Darryl Napier|Joe Napier|Sally Neace|Bill Noble|Bobbie Joe Noble|Chester Noble|Nickie Noble|Rachel Riddle|Terry Riddle|Ethel Turner|Hobart Turner|Corrine Zabala|Jonathan Zabala|Dwight Billings|John Bennette|A.D. Coleman|Wendy Ewald|Vicki Goldberg|Mary Ellen Mark|Walter Cronkite|Berthie Napier|John Napier|Wayne Riddle
title: The True Meaning of Pictures: Shelby Lee Adams' Appalachia
